publishers
Class LastSalePublisherImpl

java.lang.Object
  publishers.LastSalePublisherImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ILastSalePublisher, IPublisher
public class LastSalePublisherImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ILastSalePublisher

This is the helper class for the LastPublisher that implements methods to subscribe and unsubscribe to get information about last sale for a stock, and a method that sends out last sale updates.

Author:
Urvi

Method Detail

subscribe

public void subscribe(User u,
                      java.lang.String prod)
               throws AlreadySubscribedException,
                      InvalidArgumentException
Subscribes a user to receive last sale information for a given stock.

Specified by:
subscribe in interface IPublisher
Parameters:
u - User who wishes to subscribe.
prod - Product symbol for which User wants current market information.
Throws:
AlreadySubscribedException - if user is already subscribed to the product..
InvalidArgumentException - if u or prod is null

unSubscribe

public void unSubscribe(User u,
                        java.lang.String prod)
                 throws NotSubscribedException,
                        InvalidArgumentException
Unsubscribes a user from receiving last sale information for a given stock.

Specified by:
unSubscribe in interface IPublisher
Parameters:
u - User who wishes to unsubscribe.
prod - Product symbol for which User no longer wants last sale information
Throws:
NotSubscribedException - if user is not subscribed to the product.
InvalidArgumentException - if u or prod is null

publishLastSale

public void publishLastSale(java.lang.String product,
                            Price p,
                            int v)
                     throws InvalidArgumentException
Sends out last sale information to all users who have subscribed to a specified stock.

Specified by:
publishLastSale in interface ILastSalePublisher
Parameters:
product - Stock symbol user is subscribed to
p - Last sale price of the stock symbol user is subscribed to
v - Last volume for the stock symbol user is subscribed to
Throws:
InvalidArgumentException - if p or v is null
